meanings: (몸이) (상처 등이) painful, sore, (병으로) sick, ill, (동사로 쓰여) hurt, ache

vlive.korean: 아 상자 이거 아프네. This box is hurting me. 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 잘자요 굿나잇
너무 아프네 쉽지 않은데? This hurts. Not easy. 듣기 View video IMFACT : [THE100_IMFACT] 달달 임팩트! Ep 10.
뭐만 하면 아프네? Everywhere hurts for me, huh? 듣기 View video INFINITE : 우현이 내게오나봐 요코하마 스페셜
이게 좀 아프네 - 파인애플... It hurts a little. - FineApple fans... 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [FULL] APRIL X SUITS KNIGHTS - 에이프릴의 정장방!
vlive.english: It hurts a little. - FineApple fans...

vlive.korean: 혼자 이렇게 하려니까 팔이 아프네. My arm hurts doing this by myself. 듣기 View video B1A4 : 바나들아
vlive.english: My arm hurts doing this by myself.

examples.korean: "My adorable puppy died." "I am so sorry to hear that. My thoughts are with you." 듣기 Add to Wordbook "내 사랑스러운 강아지가 죽었어." "그 말을 들으니 너무 마음이 아프네. 내 마음도 너와 같아." 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: "My adorable puppy died." "I am so sorry to hear that. My thoughts are with you." Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Thanks. This really hurts. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 고마워요. 이거 정말 아프네요. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Thanks. This really hurts. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I have a headache. I think I'll take some aspirin. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 머리가 아프네요. 아스피린을 좀 먹어야 겠어요. Neungyule
examples.english: I have a headache. I think I'll take some aspirin. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: My heart can’t take no more. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내 마음은 견딜 수 없을 만큼 아프네요. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: My heart can’t take no more. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: But, It’s really sad to hear that you are feeling bad. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그런데 네 기분이 좋지 않다니 마음이 아프네. TIMES CORE
examples.english: But, It’s really sad to hear that you are feeling bad. Add to Wordbook
